ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // {Tifa}
Meteor is coming,
and Weapon is on the rampage{PAUSE}At a time like this,
I don't know what I'm supposed to do.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Tifa}
If only {Cloud} was here,
everything would be fine.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Tifa}
{Cloud} would{PAUSE}stand that cocky little way he
did, and tell us what to do.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Tifa}
I'm sorry, {Barret}.{PAUSE}I'm so depressed,
I'm surprised at myself.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // {Tifa}
I know.{PAUSE}That's why I want to make sure.
That's why I have to see him again.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Tifa}
I'll be able to see him someday.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {Tifa}
Deep within the earthare you
talking about the Lifestream?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:89}); // {Barret}
Yo, wanna see what {Tifa} and
the gang are doing?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:84}); // {Barret}
What's that sad face for?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:85}); // {Barret}
What? Does {Cloud} always
gotta be around?{PAUSE}We did fine without him
in the beginning{PAUSE}Right? An' what happened to
the tough girl I used to know?
Where'd she go to?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:86}); // {Barret}
Whenever I think of {Cloud},
everything gets all jumbled up.{PAUSE}No matter how powerful Shinra or Hojo is,
I can't believe they can create humans.{PAUSE}But because of them,
we know that Meteor is heading towards us.{PAUSE}Y'know, even if I saw him,
I don't have a damn idea what I'd do.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:87}); // {Barret}
Yo, Leader-man!
Get your pilot ass up here!

ops.raw: a5 00 00 3c ff cd f4 d7 fc 45 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // {Barret}
Get a hold of yourself, {Tifa}!
C'mon, let's think about this!{PAUSE}No way we can get offa
this train we're on!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Barret}
{Tifa}!
When'd you become such a wimp!

ops.raw: a5 00 00 3c ff cd f4 d7 fc 45 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:40}); // {Barret}
What're we gonna do now!
What can WE do?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // {Barret}
Huh?
Ain't there nothin' we can do?{PAUSE}An' don' go tellin' us to
wait for {Cloud} to get better.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:43}); // {Barret}
Yeah, what!? That you a spy?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:47}); // {Barret}
What else can they do to Corel!?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:49}); // {Barret}
Can't let Shinra get a hold of
the Huge Materia!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:50}); // {Barret}
Besides, when {Cloud} gets back,
I wanna show him this Huge Materia.
He's gonna be shocked.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // {Barret}
I ain't sayin' nothin' 'bout nothin'.
So justshut your face!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // {Barret}
Every group's gotta have a leader.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:54}); // {Barret}
An' that's me!{PAUSE}Or at least I wanna be
But I ain't cut out to be no leader.{PAUSE}I never knew that till lately.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:58}); // {Barret}
You been chosen to be the new leader.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:61}); // {Barret}
But for us to fight,
we gotta have Highwind, and you.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:62}); // We need it to save the Planet.
An' who's runnin' this ship? You!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:63}); // That's why you're our new leader.
Ain't no one else can do it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:67}); // {Barret}
Alright, now here's the first job.{PAUSE}The Operation Room's waiting for you!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:69}); // {Barret}
As soon as we're ready,
we'll head for the Corel reactor.{PAUSE}Hurry, {Cid}!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:94}); // {Red XIII}
Say {Cid}.{PAUSE}I wonder how {Tifa} and
{Cloud}are doing.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Red XIII}
Do you think we aren't strong
enough without {Cloud}?{PAUSE}Do you think we can't save
the Planet alone?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // {Red XIII}
And {Tifa}the reason why we all
thought it was {Cloud}
was because

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:91}); // {Red XIII}
There appears to be a small island
near the Lifestream{PAUSE}They said the Lifestream sometimes
suddenly gushes out
at the Southern island.{PAUSE}I remember hearing about this from
Seto when I was a child,
but I don't remember much else{PAUSE}I'm sorry{Tifa}.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:93}); // {Red XIII}
{Cid}.{PAUSE}Let's visit {Cloud}
and {Tifa} from
time to time.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:92}); // {Red XIII}
We'll do our best for
{Cloud} and you.{PAUSE}And {Aeris}, too.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {Red XIII}
{Cloud} is still stuck deep in
the North Crater,
where the ground cracked
and swallowed him up

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // {Red XIII}
Buried in the depths of the underground

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // {Red XIII}
The Lifestream sometimes gushes
out from cracks in the ocean
floor to the surface.{PAUSE}I heard about such a place.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:48}); // {Red XIII}
And the Huge Materia{PAUSE}You mean the Huge Materia, don't you?
I've heard about it.{PAUSE}When our small Materia nears
the larger one,
there should be some reaction.{PAUSE}I'm certain of it.{PAUSE}That's why we're using
the Materia power
in our fight

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:76}); // {Red XIII}
I wonder how {Cloud}'s doing.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:77}); // {Red XIII}
I wonder if {Tifa}
needs a break

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:78}); // {Red XIII}
I could look after him instead.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:103}); // {Cait Sith}
Shinra'sstopped.{PAUSE}Now we've got to be careful.
I know Heidegger and his gang
are plotting something.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:96}); // {Cait Sith}
{Tifa}, I'll give you
info on Shinra.{PAUSE}Ask me if there's anything
you don't understand.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:97}); // {Cait Sith}
Everything appears calm
right now at Shinra.{PAUSE}So now's the time to
look for {Cloud}.{PAUSE}I'm worried about him, too.{PAUSE}I wonder where {Cloud} is.
Or could he already be

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:102}); // {Cait Sith}
Hmmn, the Huge Materia is at
Corel, Fort Condor, and{PAUSE}I'm sure there was another place that had it.
Where was that?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:102}); // {Cait Sith}
Hmmn, the Huge Materia is at
Corel, Fort Condor, and{PAUSE}I'm sure there was another place that had it.
Where was that?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:42}); // {Cait Sith}
Oh, I've got some news.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:44}); // {Cait Sith}
Yeah
I've already told you I was.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:45}); // {Cait Sith}
Both Gya ha ha and Kya ha ha
are up to something.{PAUSE}Wanna eavesdrop?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:51}); // {Cait Sith}
So, what are you
saying, {Barret}?{PAUSE}Even though you're always knocking him,
you really want
{Cloud} to return.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:108}); // {Vincent}
You look really tired, maybe you're ready
to give up being leader?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:104}); // {Vincent}
So glad you're all
right, {Tifa}.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:105}); // {Vincent}
Too much hope is the opposite of despair.{PAUSE}An overpowering love may
consume you in the end.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:106}); // {Vincent}
{Cid}I wish I had your
go-get-them attitude.{PAUSE}It appears my feelings vanished
into thin air ever since
my long slumber.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:107}); // {Vincent}
Don't expect me to do anything
other than fight beside you.{PAUSE}I have no words of comfort.{PAUSE}Of course, I don't believe you're
the type who needs the kindness
from others

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // {Cid}
Well, it takes all kinds.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Cid}
I want you to know
I didn't dislike him.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Cid}
I gotta admit he was a strange dude.{PAUSE}Just when you thought he was cool,
he'd do some damn fool thing.{PAUSE}Then when you thought he was smart,
he'd show how stupid he was.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Cid}
Everything about him from his movements
to his speech were kinda odd.{PAUSE}Knowin' what I do now,
I can see why he was that way.{PAUSE}Well, as long as you stay alive,
you just might see him again someday.
So cheer up, sis.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Cid}
If we can find out where he is,
the Highwind'll get us there in no time.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Cid}
If we can find out where he is,
the Highwind'll get us there in no time.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Cid}
I want you to know
I didn't dislike him.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Cid}
I gotta admit he was a strange dude.{PAUSE}Just when you thought he was cool,
he'd do some damn fool thing.{PAUSE}Then when you thought he was smart,
he'd show how stupid he was.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Cid}
Everything about him from his movements
to his speech were kinda odd.{PAUSE}Knowin' what I do now,
I can see why he was that way.{PAUSE}Well, as long as you stay alive,
you just might see him again someday.
So cheer up, sis.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Cid}
If we can find out where he is,
the Highwind'll get us there in no time.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // {Cid}
I put a lot of things for
you in the Operation room,
so go get ready.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Cid}
I want you to know
I didn't dislike him.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Cid}
I gotta admit he was a strange dude.{PAUSE}Just when you thought he was cool,
he'd do some damn fool thing.{PAUSE}Then when you thought he was smart,
he'd show how stupid he was.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Cid}
Everything about him from his movements
to his speech were kinda odd.{PAUSE}Knowin' what I do now,
I can see why he was that way.{PAUSE}Well, as long as you stay alive,
you just might see him again someday.
So cheer up, sis.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Cid}
If we can find out where he is,
the Highwind'll get us there in no time.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // {Cid}
OK!
You just signal when you're
ready to fly full speed.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:109}); // {Cid}
No use singing the blues, baby.
The best thing to do is to keep movin'.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Cid}
Welcome to my airship-the Highwind!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Cid}
What's wrong!?
You should be more excited than that!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Cid}
{Tifa}, sorry, but
I've gotta show this moron
how to land the ship.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // {Cid}
Don't worry, it'll be done in a minute.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Cid}
Oh, and {Tifa}{PAUSE}No matter what your goal is,
you've got to be prepared.{PAUSE}Go to the Operation room
and get ready.
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // Get a hold of yourself!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:59}); // {Cid}
Pain in the ass. Forget it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:64}); // {Cid}
Hmmthis ship's gonna save the
Planet, huh? Ain't that gonna be
just a little tough?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:65}); // {Cid}
Oh man, stab me in the heart.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:66}); // {Cid}
I'm a man, too!{PAUSE}Okay, I'll do it!
Everyone, follow me!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:74}); // {Cid}
It's tough being the leader.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:75}); // {Cid}
{Cloud} did a great job.
Sheesh{PAUSE}Shall we go to Mideel
to check on things?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:80}); // {Cid}
Where shall we go next?
Shall we head for the Corel reactor?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:81}); // {Cid}
What's next?
Shall we head for Fort Condor?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:111}); // {Cid}
Hey you! What the hell are you doin'!?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:110}); // Whenever anyone talks to me,
I get all nervous and mess things up!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:113}); // All we have to do is just pilot.
They don't have to talk to us.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:114}); // Looks like you turned out to be the
leader after all, Captain

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:116}); // Pilot in Training (LV7)
Man! We're taking off!
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // Pilot in training (LV3)
Yaaaaahh!
Don't talk to me right now!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // Pilot in training (LV3)
Waaaaah!
Captain {Cid}!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // Pilot in training (LV3)
Yaaaaahh!
Don't talk to me right now!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // Pilot in training (LV4)
Eagggggh! We're off!
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:70}); // Pilot in training (LV5)
Eaggggghh!
Congrats' on becoming
our leader, Cap'n!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:83}); // Pilot in training (LV6)
Yaah! We're taking off!
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

Anyhow,
I'm going to the World Map
I'm not goin'
Highwind

{Cid}
Welcome to my airship-the Highwind!

{Cid}
What's wrong!?
You should be more excited than that!

{Red XIII}
{Cid}

{Cid}
Yeah

{Tifa}
Not enough crew.

{Red XIII}
Do you think we aren't strong
enough without {Cloud}?{PAUSE}Do you think we can't save
the Planet alone?

{Tifa}
Meteor is coming,
and Weapon is on the rampage{PAUSE}At a time like this,
I don't know what I'm supposed to do.

{Tifa}
No idea at all

{Barret}
Get a hold of yourself, {Tifa}!
C'mon, let's think about this!{PAUSE}No way we can get offa
this train we're on!

{Tifa}
If only {Cloud} was here,
everything would be fine.

{Tifa}
{Cloud} would{PAUSE}stand that cocky little way he
did, and tell us what to do.

{Tifa}
He'd say, 'Everything's
under control, {Tifa}.'

{Barret}
{Tifa}!
When'd you become such a wimp!

{Tifa}
I'm sorry, {Barret}.{PAUSE}I'm so depressed,
I'm surprised at myself.

{Red XIII}
And {Tifa}the reason why we all
thought it was {Cloud}
was because

{Tifa}
I know.{PAUSE}That's why I want to make sure.
That's why I have to see him again.

{Cid}
I want you to know
I didn't dislike him.

{Cid}
I gotta admit he was a strange dude.{PAUSE}Just when you thought he was cool,
he'd do some damn fool thing.{PAUSE}Then when you thought he was smart,
he'd show how stupid he was.

{Cid}
Everything about him from his movements
to his speech were kinda odd.{PAUSE}Knowin' what I do now,
I can see why he was that way.{PAUSE}Well, as long as you stay alive,
you just might see him again someday.
So cheer up, sis.

{Tifa}
I'll be able to see him someday.

{Cid}
If we can find out where he is,
the Highwind'll get us there in no time.

Maybe

{Cloud} is still stuck deep in
the North Crater,
where the ground cracked
and swallowed him up

Buried in the depths of the underground

The Lifestream sometimes gushes
out from cracks in the ocean
floor to the surface.{PAUSE}I heard about such a place.

{Red XIII}
Maybe, just maybe {Cloud}'s

Yaaaaahh!
Don't talk to me right now!
Get a hold of yourself!

Waaaaah!
Captain {Cid}!

{Cid}
{Tifa}, sorry, but
I've gotta show this moron
how to land the ship.

{Cid}
Don't worry, it'll be done in a minute.

{Cid}
Oh, and {Tifa}{PAUSE}No matter what your goal is,
you've got to be prepared.{PAUSE}Go to the Operation room
and get ready.

{Cid}
I put a lot of things for
you in the Operation room,
so go get ready.

{Cid}
OK!
You just signal when you're
ready to fly full speed.

Pilot in training (LV4)
Eagggghh! Are we going?
We're going
We're staying put

Pilot in training (LV4)
Eagggggh! We're off!

{Cid}
Well, it takes all kinds.

{Barret}
What're we gonna do now!
What can WE do?

{Barret}
Huh?
Ain't there nothin' we can do?{PAUSE}An' don' go tellin' us to
wait for {Cloud} to get better.

{Cait Sith}
Oh, I've got some news.

{Barret}
Yeah, what!? That you a spy?

{Cait Sith}
Yeah
I've already told you I was.

{Cait Sith}
Both Gya ha ha and Kya ha ha
are up to something.{PAUSE}Wanna eavesdrop?

{Barret}
Corel!

{Barret}
What else can they do to Corel!?

{Red XIII}
And the Huge Materia{PAUSE}You mean the Huge Materia, don't you?
I've heard about it.{PAUSE}When our small Materia nears
the larger one,
there should be some reaction.{PAUSE}I'm certain of it.{PAUSE}That's why we're using
the Materia power
in our fight

{Barret}
Can't let Shinra get a hold of
the Huge Materia!

{Barret}
Besides, when {Cloud} gets back,
I wanna show him this Huge Materia.
He's gonna be shocked.

{Cait Sith}
So, what are you
saying, {Barret}?{PAUSE}Even though you're always knocking him,
you really want
{Cloud} to return.

{Barret}
I ain't sayin' nothin' 'bout nothin'.
So justshut your face!

{Barret}
Every group's gotta have a leader.

{Barret}
An' that's me!{PAUSE}Or at least I wanna be
But I ain't cut out to be no leader.{PAUSE}I never knew that till lately.

{Barret}
That's what it is.

{Cid}
ZZZZhmph?

{Cid}
Wha? What's goin' on?

{Barret}
You been chosen to be the new leader.

{Cid}
Pain in the ass. Forget it.

{Barret}
But for us to fight,
we gotta have Highwind, and you.

We need it to save the Planet.
An' who's runnin' this ship? You!

That's why you're our new leader.
Ain't no one else can do it.

{Cid}
Hmmthis ship's gonna save the
Planet, huh? Ain't that gonna be
just a little tough?

{Cid}
Oh man, stab me in the heart.

{Cid}
I'm a man, too!{PAUSE}Okay, I'll do it!
Everyone, follow me!

{Barret}
Alright, now here's the first job.{PAUSE}The Operation Room's waiting for you!

{Cid}
Yeah!!

{Barret}
As soon as we're ready,
we'll head for the Corel reactor.{PAUSE}Hurry, {Cid}!

Eaggggghh!
Congrats' on becoming
our leader, Cap'n!

Yaaah! Are we taking off?
{CHOICE}Yes
{CHOICE}No

Eagggggh! We're taking off now!

{Cid}
Hey

{Cid}
It's tough being the leader.

{Cid}
{Cloud} did a great job.
Sheesh{PAUSE}Shall we go to Mideel
to check on things?

{Red XIII}
I wonder how {Cloud}'s doing.

{Red XIII}
I wonder if {Tifa}
needs a break

{Red XIII}
I could look after him instead.

{Cid}
Well, let's see
What's a good place to head to?{PAUSE}Corel?
Fort Condor?

{Cid}
Where shall we go next?
Shall we head for the Corel reactor?

{Cid}
What's next?
Shall we head for Fort Condor?

Yaah! Shall we take off?
{CHOICE}Yes
{CHOICE}No

Pilot in training (LV6)
Yaah! We're taking off!

{Barret}
What's that sad face for?

{Barret}
What? Does {Cloud} always
gotta be around?{PAUSE}We did fine without him
in the beginning{PAUSE}Right? An' what happened to
the tough girl I used to know?
Where'd she go to?

{Barret}
Whenever I think of {Cloud},
everything gets all jumbled up.{PAUSE}No matter how powerful Shinra or Hojo is,
I can't believe they can create humans.{PAUSE}But because of them,
we know that Meteor is heading towards us.{PAUSE}Y'know, even if I saw him,
I don't have a damn idea what I'd do.

{Barret}
Yo, Leader-man!
Get your pilot ass up here!

{Barret}
Leader-man? What's next!?

{Barret}
Yo, wanna see what {Tifa} and
the gang are doing?

{Red XIII}
Cheer up, {Tifa}

{Red XIII}
There appears to be a small island
near the Lifestream{PAUSE}They said the Lifestream sometimes
suddenly gushes out
at the Southern island.{PAUSE}I remember hearing about this from
Seto when I was a child,
but I don't remember much else{PAUSE}I'm sorry{Tifa}.

{Red XIII}
We'll do our best for
{Cloud} and you.{PAUSE}And {Aeris}, too.

{Red XIII}
{Cid}.{PAUSE}Let's visit {Cloud}
and {Tifa} from
time to time.

{Red XIII}
Say {Cid}.{PAUSE}I wonder how {Tifa} and
{Cloud}are doing.

{Cait Sith}
{Tifa}.{PAUSE}You saw him slapping Scarlet around?{PAUSE}Yeah, he did a good job, too.
It felt good just watching.{PAUSE}Let's never forget that
spirit, and give it our all!

{Cait Sith}
{Tifa}, I'll give you
info on Shinra.{PAUSE}Ask me if there's anything
you don't understand.

{Cait Sith}
Everything appears calm
right now at Shinra.{PAUSE}So now's the time to
look for {Cloud}.{PAUSE}I'm worried about him, too.{PAUSE}I wonder where {Cloud} is.
Or could he already be

{Cait Sith}
{Tifa}
Do you think it's a good
idea for me to quit Shinra?

{Cait Sith}
Oh, I'm sorry.{PAUSE}{Tifa}, there's no way
I can quit right now

{Cait Sith}
{Cid},
I'm expecting big things from you

{Cait Sith}
{Cid}, you're tired, huh?{PAUSE}I'd like to change places with you, but
I'm in charge of information,
so I can't. Sorry.

{Cait Sith}
Hmmn, the Huge Materia is at
Corel, Fort Condor, and{PAUSE}I'm sure there was another place that had it.
Where was that?

{Cait Sith}
Shinra'sstopped.{PAUSE}Now we've got to be careful.
I know Heidegger and his gang
are plotting something.
